===Noun===
{{zh-noun}}

# Heat-clearing ''[[w:Materia medica|materia medica]]'' in [[traditional Chinese medicine]]. This term refers to herbs and other medicinal substances that are used to relieve "heat" symptoms, such as sore throat and mouth ulcer.
